summary: When a close friend of the Drew family is accused of murder in a rural community, Nancy, aided by boyfriend Ted, helps her lawyer father expose the real killers.
cast: Bonita Granville|Frankie Thomas|John Litel|Aldrich Bowker|Charlotte Wynters|Edgar Edwards|Renie Riano|Roger Imhof|Erville Alderson|Willie Best|John Harron|Cliff Saum|Tom Wilson|Nat Carr|Glen Cavender|Loia Cheaney|Creighton Hale|Stuart Holmes|Al Lloyd|John J. Richardson|Leo White|Jack Wise
title: Nancy Drew... Trouble Shooter
